Operator UI Helm Charts

Web-based frontend interface for Forkspacer workspace management and monitoring

üì¶ Installation

‚ÑπÔ∏è Make sure you have Helm 3.0+ and kubectl configured for your Kubernetes cluster 
# Add Operator UI Helm repository
helm repo add forkspacer-ui https://forkspacer.github.io/operator-ui
helm repo update

# Install Operator UI standalone
helm install operator-ui forkspacer-ui/operator-ui \
  --namespace operator-ui \
  --create-namespace

# Or install as part of complete Forkspacer
helm repo add forkspacer https://forkspacer.github.io/forkspacer
helm install forkspacer forkspacer/forkspacer \
  --set operatorUI.enabled=true \
  --namespace operator-system \
  --create-namespace
